meanings.definition: The 23rd letter of the Greek alphabet.
meanings.sent1: In the Greek alphabet, psi comes after chi.
meanings.sent2: I learned about psi while studying Greek letters.
meanings.sent3: The Greek student mixed up psi with phi in the alphabet song.
meanings.sent4: Her name was written in psi, standing out among the other letters.
meanings.sent5: The symbol for psi looks like a trident, unique and intriguing.

meanings.definition: A unit of pressure equal to one pound per square inch.
meanings.sent1: The tire pressure was measured in psi.
meanings.sent2: He checked the psi before inflating the basketball.
meanings.sent3: The balloon popped when the psi exceeded the limit.
meanings.sent4: The psi gauge showed the pressure building up inside the tank.
meanings.sent5: The scuba diver monitored the psi to ensure safe diving conditions.

meanings.definition: A term used in parapsychology to refer to psychic abilities.
meanings.sent1: She claimed to have psi powers that allowed her to predict the future.
meanings.sent2: The researchers conducted experiments to study psi phenomena.
meanings.sent3: The psychic hotline offered advice based on psi readings.
meanings.sent4: His intuition was so strong, it felt like a surge of psi energy.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious aura around her was attributed to her psi abilities.
